attack-object.name: Brute Force
attack-object.comments: Most scores have been assessed as Partial because this control increases the strength of user passwords thereby reducing the likelihood of a successful brute force attack.  But given sufficient resources, an adversary may still successfully execute the attack vectors included  in this mapping.
attack-object.score-comment: This control provides partial protection for most of this technique's sub-techniques and therefore has been scored as Partial.
